channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Rip-Off Britain
channel.desc: Gloria Hunniford, Julia Somerville and Louise Minchin investigate the curse of knotweed after one couple discovered it in their garden shortly after they moved in. The neighbours say that it has been there for years, so why didn't the survey or seller declare it? Plus the Great British pothole crisis. With incidents at record levels, there's advice on both the right way to claim for the damage to your car and how to make sure the pothole gets fixed.
